name: Quest Of Life Modern Age
description:
I've spend 20 days to make this game for the 5th Annual Driftwood Jam.

I hope you guys like it.... I already tried to make the game short but im pretty much strugle since i want to make a story that make sense and have feeling about it because the game is having a slow pasing gameplay. But atleast i want to find a experience on this jam this is my first time joining a jam so have fun !

Since it's only using RTP i want to challange my self XD

I'm not an english speaker but i hope you guys enjoy it !

Game Description :

it's a game about a boy who live in the city that has been lockdown because of the zombie apocalypse. The story is about Tim who need to survive in the world he is in now.. Your job is to make your character did not get hungry or lose health.

The game have Three Ending :

I already play test the game and i know this will happen but people who play the game will get.

- Good Ending (20% chance first try)

- Bad Ending (40% chance first try)

- Ending A (40% chance first try)

- No ending (100% Drifty only since the game finish in 40 minute)

- Rage Quit  (100% People who don't know my broken english maybe but meh..)

Plugin I use to manipulate the map effect and other mechanic :

Terrax

Mr.Trivel

Masked

Yanfly Engine

Himeworks

Kadokawa

Thanks for checking my page :))))
